com.cmput301f17t07.ingroove.DataManagers.Command

Class ServerCommandManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301f17t07.ingroove.DataManagers.Command.ServerCommandManager

  • public class ServerCommandManager
extends java.lang.Object
    [Singleton Model Class] A class to manage all the command objects and execute them when a network connection can be established Created by Christopher Walter on 2017-11-03.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ServerCommandManager.ExecuteAsync
      Static inner class to execute commands on a background thread Loops through all commands in the queue and calls their execute method, upon execution removes them from the queue
      static class  ServerCommandManager.InitializeUserAsync
      Specific Async task for adding a new user
